description: This kale salad with anchovy dressing packs a serious flavour punch and is great as an entree or side dish.
name: Kale & Artichoke Salad with Anchovy Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g grilled artichokes, from a jar, oil reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Blitz the anchovies, mustard, half of the lemon juice, garlic, chives, olive oil and artichoke oil together in a blender until smooth.
Place the kale in a large bowl and massage the leaves with the rest of the lemon juice.
Tip the artichokes into the bowl, pour over the dressing and toss well to coat. Sprinkle grated parmesan and pumpkin seeds on top and serve.
